dc:title: We Go On Record: CW Refuses Tax Exemption
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Explains CW finances and why the CW refuses to apply for tax exempt status. Cites Ammon Hennacy and Karl Meyer's tax resistance as nonviolent protest against war. Upholds the principle that governments should never do what small bodies can accomplish.
